title: Creation of Device fails due to a ClusterResourceGroup Subtype value
content:
You have Native SACM enabled. You try to create a Device in the Agent UI. If you select a ClusterResourceGroup value as the SubType, the Device cannot be created.

Cause

In the UCMDB data model, the cluster resource group is a relation CI type instead of a standalone CI type and cannot be created singly.

Solution

Hide the "ClusterResourceGroup" enum values from the Subtype dropdown list on the Device creation page.

In the Device workflow, manually add a condition "Define suggested values by a list to list mapping" rule in the Rendering form Event with the field value as follows:

  • Condition: ${tenant_settings.ENABLE_CMSX == true}
  • Field1: Subtype; 
  • Field2: Subtype;
  • Mapping definition: Keep empty
  • Default values: select every enumeration value in the Subtype except ‘ClusterResourceGroup’
